author: Special Correspondent
text:
Applications till February 20

NCC cadets in the State can apply till February 20 to get grace marks in the SSLC examinations, a press note issued here on Tuesday said. Applications should be submitted through the respective schools. Details can be had from the nearest NCC offices and from the websitewww.keralancc.org, the press note added.
title: Grace marks for NCC cadets
